mapper.update: {call generate_stat( #{ymd, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{paramBettype, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{paramMinPattenrCnt, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxPattenrCnt, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{paramMinHitRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxHitRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMinIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramPath, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} )}

{call generate_stat_levelrank( #{ymd, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{paramBettype, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{paramStatStartYmd, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{paramMinPattenrCnt, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxPattenrCnt, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{paramMinHitRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxHitRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMinIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramMaxIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{paramPath, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} )}

{call generate_boatstat( #{fromYmd, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{toYmd, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{betType, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{betTypeName, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{kumiban, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{pattern, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{table, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN}, #{minPatternCnt, jdbcType = INTEGER, mode = IN}, #{minIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{maxIncomeRate, jdbcType = NUMERIC, mode = IN}, #{path, jdbcType = VARCHAR, mode = IN} )}
